data.title: Python3-alignlib
data.description: edit and Hamming distances for biological sequences
data.name: tinyalign

evidence: "A small Python module providing edit distance (aka Levenshtein distance...) and Hamming distance computation." (library-style module)
PyPI badge and link: "[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/tinyalign.svg?branch=main)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tinyalign)" (distribution via PyPI)
Example usage via import: ">>> from tinyalign import edit_distance, hamming_distance" (used as a general-purpose string distance utility, not research-specific)
